response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Given its worth to you, I propose a purchase price of $800,000. I understand that this might be a substantial amount, but I assure you, the quality and benefits of the product far exceed this investment. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you wish to discuss this offer in more detail. Looking forward to your response.", "product_price": 800000}
